com.iota.iri.service.transactionpruning.jobs

Class UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iota.iri.service.transactionpruning.jobs.AbstractTransactionPrunerJob
      • com.iota.iri.service.transactionpruning.jobs.UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionPrunerJob

    public class UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob
extends AbstractTransactionPrunerJob
    Represents a job for the TransactionPruner that cleans up all unconfirmed transactions approving a certain transaction. It is used to clean up orphaned subtangles when they become irrelevant for the ledger.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob(Hash transactionHash)
      Creates a job that cleans up all transactions that are approving the transaction with the given hash, which have not been confirmed, yet.

    • Method Summary

      void process()
      This method processes the cleanup job and performs the actual pruning.

      This method is used to serialize the job before it gets persisted by the TransactionPruner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob

        public UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob(Hash transactionHash)
        Creates a job that cleans up all transactions that are approving the transaction with the given hash, which have not been confirmed, yet.
        Parameters:
        transactionHash - hash of the transaction that shall have its unconfirmed approvers pruned

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob parse(java.lang.String input)
        This method parses the serialized representation of a UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob and creates the corresponding object. It simply creates a hash from the input and passes it on to the UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob(Hash).
        Parameters:
        input - serialized String representation of a MilestonePrunerJob
        Returns:
        a new UnconfirmedSubtanglePrunerJob with the provided hash

      • process

        public void process()
             throws TransactionPruningException
        This method processes the cleanup job and performs the actual pruning. It iterates through all approvers and collects their hashes if they have not been approved. Then its deletes them from the database (atomic) and also removes them from the runtime caches. After the job is done
        Specified by:
        process in interface TransactionPrunerJob
        Specified by:
        process in class AbstractTransactionPrunerJob
        Throws:
        TransactionPruningException - if something goes wrong while processing the job

      • serialize

        public java.lang.String serialize()
        This method is used to serialize the job before it gets persisted by the TransactionPruner. It simply dumps the string representation of the transactionHash .
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface TransactionPrunerJob
        Specified by:
        serialize in class AbstractTransactionPrunerJob
        Returns:
        string representing a serialized version of this job
